content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43, y=-84)
Consists of a burner-mining-drill at position (x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position (x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15, y=-50)
Consists of a burner-mining-drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Furnace group at position(x=40, y=-82)
Consists of multiple furnaces at positions (x=40.0, y=-82.0), (x=45.0, y=-83.0), (x=42.0, y=-81.0), (x=45.0, y=-80.0), and (x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10, y=10)
Consists of a steam engine at position (x=10.5, y=10.5), a boiler at position (x=-6.0, y=24.5), and an offshore pump at position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with an input of automation-science-pack

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when mining with a full chest
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when using a furnace without ingredients
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before starting the furnace
### Errors when using a boiler without fuel
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before starting the boiler
### Errors when using a steam engine without input liquid
- Ensure the steam engine has an input liquid before starting the steam engine
